## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (e9e637e3589336a593724a83e7850a5643daa5f328ad3e27b46006cef63b8c84)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'npm-cli-release-please' @ 2.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
